# Set up microservice
RUN wget -q -O sdno-driver-huawei-servicechain-1.0.0-RC1.zip https://nexus.open-o.org/content/repositories/autorelease-1073/org/openo/sdno/driver-huawei-servicechain/servicechaindriverservice-deployment/1.0.0-RC1/servicechaindriverservice-deployment-1.0.0-RC1.zip && unzip -q -o -B sdno-driver-huawei-servicechain-1.0.0-RC1.zip && rm -f sdno-driver-huawei-servicechain-1.0.0-RC1.zip
EXPOSE 8542
RUN echo Open-O 1.0.0-RC1 autorelease-1073 > VERSION
